subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Swimming
Doping (Sports)
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: After repeated Chinese scandals in the 1990s, reactions to the swimmer Ye Shiwen’s record-breaking performance fell into an uncomfortable gray area between celebration and suspicion.
snippet: After repeated Chinese scandals in the 1990s, reactions to the swimmer Ye Shiwen’s record-breaking performance fell into an uncomfortable gray area between celebration and suspicion.
